name: @continuum/jtag-widget-ui
description: JTAG Widget UI - Positron Widget System (Vite + Signals)

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:ports && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:modules
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:server: npx tsc src/minimal-server.ts --outDir dist --rootDir src --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --moduleResolution node --skipLibCheck --esModuleInterop
